EmailTemplate.description: TEAM-36711Lighthouse Post Install Survey for Auto
EmailTemplate.name: Auto Lighthouse Post Install Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Lighthouse
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
We are very excited to have you as a client and value your feedback. We’re committed to continually improving the quality of the services and products we provide to you.
In that spirit, we would appreciate your feedback on Lighthouse 360 by answering a few questions regarding your installation. This survey should take only a few minutes to complete and will help us ensure your success with our services and products.
Click use the below link to access the survey: http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=2izf29g78rdux&q1={!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Practice_NameId__c}&q2={!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.OwnerFirstName}
Thank you, Lighthouse Support
